content.text:
# President of the Government of New Caledonia

The president of the Government of New Caledonia is a political position in the Government of New Caledonia formed in 1999, after the Nouméa Accord was signed in 1998.
New Caledonia has a collegial government with 11 members elected by Congress of New Caledonia with proportional representation on party list voting, according to the rule of the highest average. Then, according to the Nouméa Accord, the 11 members elect President and Vice President among themselves.

Timeline
This is a graphical lifespan timeline of presidents of the Government of New Caledonia. They are listed in order of office (Martin is shown in order of his first presidency).
Define $now =
ImageSize  = width:$width height:$height
PlotArea   = right:10 left:1 bottom:80 top:60
Period     = from:$start till:$end
TimeAxis   = orientation:horizontal
Legend = orientation:vertical position:bottom columns:1
Colors =
id:bg                 value:white
id:lightline          value:rgb(0.8, 0.8, 0.8)
id:lighttext          value:rgb(0.5, 0.5, 0.5)
id:LIFESPAN           value:rgb(0.88, 0.90, 0.70) Legend: Lifespan
id:PRES_RAL           value:rgb(0.39, 0.58, 0.93) Legend: The_Rally
id:PRES_FUT           value:rgb(1, 0.65, 0) Legend: Future_Together
id:PRES_CAL           value:rgb(0.98, 0.5, 0.45) Legend: Caledonia_Together
id:PRES_NUI           value:rgb(0.13, 0.13, 0.18) Legend: National_Union_for_Independence
id:NAME               value:rgb(0.15, 0.13, 0.05)
id:TODAY              value:green
BackgroundColors = canvas:bg
ScaleMinor = gridcolor:lightline unit:year increment:1 start:$start
ScaleMajor = gridcolor:lighttext unit:year increment:10 start:1930
Define $dy = -5 # shift text to button side of bar
LineData=
at:$now color:TODAY width:0.1
PlotData=
bar:1 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1931 till:1999 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Jean Lèques
color:PRES_RAL
from:1999 till:2001
color:LIFESPAN
from:2001 till:2022

color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1950 till:2001 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Pierre Frogier
color:PRES_RAL
from:2001 till:2004
color:LIFESPAN
from:2004 till:$now
bar:3 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1950 till:2004 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Marie-Noëlle Thémereau
color:PRES_FUT
from:2004 till:2007
color:LIFESPAN
from:2007 till:$now
bar:4 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1954 till:2007 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Harold Martin
color:PRES_FUT
from:2007 till:2009
color:LIFESPAN
from:2009 till:2011
color:PRES_FUT
from:2011 till:2014
color:LIFESPAN
from:2014 till:$now
bar:5 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1958 till:2009 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Philippe Gomès
color:PRES_CAL
from:2009 till:2011
color:LIFESPAN
from:2011 till:$now
bar:6 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1962 till:2014 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Cynthia Ligeard
color:PRES_RAL
from:2014 till:2015
color:LIFESPAN
from:2015 till:$now

color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1968 till:2015 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Philippe Germain
color:PRES_CAL
from:2015 till:2019
color:LIFESPAN
from:2019 till:$now
bar:8 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1967 till:2019 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Thierry Santa
color:PRES_RAL
from:2019 till:2021

from:2021 till:$now

color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1958 till:2021 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Louis Mapou

from:2021 till:2025

from:1975 till:2025 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Alcide Ponga

from:2025 till:$now
TextData =

textcolor:green

text:Updated /

fontsize:L
textcolor:black
text:"Lifespan and terms of office of each New Caledonian President"
